name: PowerPlatformInstallCatalog
description: Install a catalog item to the target environment.
author: Microsoft

inputs.name: authenticationType
inputs.label: Authentication type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Authentication via username/password is simpler to set up but won't work if your AAD tenant requires MFA; use Service Principal Name (SPN) if MFA is required.

inputs.name: PowerPlatformEnvironment
inputs.label: Service connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Authenticate with your Power Platform environment with username/password. Does not support MFA.

inputs.name: PowerPlatformSPN
inputs.label: Service connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Authenticate with your Power Platform environment with an Azure AppID, tenantID and client secret.

inputs.name: CatalogItemId
inputs.label: Catalog Item Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Id of the catalog item to be installed on the target environment.

inputs.name: TargetEnvironmentUrl
inputs.label: Target environment url (deprecated)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Url of the target environment for catalog item installation.

inputs.name: TargetEnvironment
inputs.label: Target environment
inputs.helpMarkDown: Url or ID of the target environment for catalog item installation.

inputs.name: Settings
inputs.label: Runtime Package Settings
inputs.helpMarkDown: Runtime Package Settings for the installation framework to execute. The format of the string must be `key=value|key=value`.

inputs.name: TargetVersion
inputs.label: Target version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Target version to install. If left empty, published version is selected.

inputs.name: PollStatus
inputs.label: Poll Status
inputs.helpMarkDown: Poll to check status of your request.
